message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it's worth the price of $95.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate it, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $85 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for the best price.  While I'm confident in the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $90.  This is my final offer, as I do have other interested buyers.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your price. I appreciate your flexibility. However, I still believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $87 for the product.
